resources.string:
Hello,

There is no need to use this app directly.

For C:Geo: When you want to navigate to geocache, simply select that geocache, click Navigate and select Pebble! 

For the Geocaching official app: Select Radar and pick Pebble Navigator

For Locus: Select Menu->More->Share and select Pebble Navigator

To close Pebble Navigation, click on the persistent notification.

You must have application installed on your Pebble as well. Please read description or view video on Google Play for more info.
Click here to stop the app!
